CustomField.description: Returns Renewal ARR value of the product line.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( For_Renewal__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Won") ), Original_Price_ARR_OneOff__c * Quantity, NULL )
CustomField.label: Renewal ARR
